recipe.title: Eggplant "Tacos"
instructions: Slice the eggplant into 1/2-inch rounds and spread on an oiled baking sheet. Sprinkle with olive oil and salt and roast at 400° F for 8 minutes on each side, or until golden. Place a piece of Brie and fresh cilantro or basil on each eggplant round and fold like a mini taco.
Slice the eggplant into 1/2-inch rounds and spread on an oiled baking sheet.
Sprinkle with olive oil and salt and roast at 400° F for 8 minutes on each side, or until golden.
Place a piece of Brie and fresh cilantro or basil on each eggplant round and fold like a mini taco.
